com.gembox.spreadsheet.tables

Class TableColumn

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gembox.spreadsheet.tables.TableColumn

  • public final class TableColumn
extends Object
    Represents a Table column. Supported in XLSX only.

    • Method Detail

      • getDataRange

        public CellRange getDataRange()
        Gets the column data range.

        Method returns column range without header row and, if enabled, totals row.

        Returns:
        The CellRange.

      • getIndex

        public int getIndex()
        Gets the column index.
        Returns:
        The column index.

        Gets the column name.
        Returns:

      • getParent

        public Table getParent()
        Gets the parent Table.
        Returns:
        The parent Table.

      • getRange

        public CellRange getRange()
        Gets the column range.

        Method returns complete column range which includes header row and, if enabled, totals row.

        Returns:
        The CellRange.

      • getTotalsRowFormula

        public String getTotalsRowFormula()
        Gets the totals row formula.
        Returns:
        The totals row formula.

        public void setTotalsRowFormula(String totalsRowFormula)
        Gets the totals row formula.
        Parameters:
        totalsRowFormula - The totals row formula.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Parent table doesn't have totals row.

      • setTotalsRowFunction

        public void setTotalsRowFunction(TotalsRowFunction totalsRowFunction)
        Sets the totals row function.
        Parameters:
        totalsRowFunction - The totals row function.
        Throws:
